titles.title: A bill for the relief of Maria Cristina Degrassi.
A bill for the relief of Maria Cristina Degrassi.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Declares Maria Cristina Degrass to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
